162b8(mdo): pa mdol sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/ mya'i rgyal po dem// rgyal po'i pho brang/ khyab par ru 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o// de mchis nas kyang/ rgyal po'i pho bra ba spos cha ba sna tshogs kyis// 
163a1(mdo): chag chag btab cing / me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram par spos cha ba sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab// der chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par rgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o// phyogs der/ 
163a2(mdo): la/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdam sna tshogs kyi legs par rgyan pa par bgyi'o// myi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o// gos bri rab tu gdal ba/ gos sam pa mdzes pa// bgos nas// sna tshogs kyis
163a3(mdo): rgya nad par bgyi'o// bdag gi snya ma rab tu dmal ba gdib bar bgyis te/ stan de la mchis nas/ rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par gyi bgyi'o// de ba rgyal srid kyi rabang phyags la chags par myil bgyi'o// rgyags
163a4(mdo): pa dang pa rgyal dang / dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems dkyis/ gser 'od/ dam pa mdol sde li dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyam par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed
163a5(mdo): pa bgyi'o// myi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus nas// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang/ rgyal po li bu mo rnams dang // btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la/ sdug pa dang phan pas
163a6(mdo): blta bar bgyi'o// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu/ rnams dang / rgyal po li bu mo rnams dpal snyam pa sba bar bgyi'o// btsun mo'i 'khoram gyi tshogs thams cad la yang/ tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o// chos
163a7(mdo): nyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs spyod tu gsal bar bgyi'o// dga' ba bsam gyis kyi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dgal ba dang / bdel ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa
163a8(mdo): bdel bar bgyi// dbang po bdel bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o// bdag dgal ba chen pos dgal bar bgyi'o// rab tu dgal ba chen po bskyed nas// chos smra ba
163b1(mdo): bsu bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// rgyal po chen po bzhi la la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ kyi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad
163b2(mdo): dkar pos sar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bgyi'o// spud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs/ par brgyan par bgyi'o// gdugs kar po yang gzung bar bya'o// rgyal po'i mthul chen po dang / rgyal po la
163b3(mdo): bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po la pho brang de nas byangs / chos smra ba bsul ba'i phyir/ der 'gro bar bya'o// de mi'i phyir zhe na/ myi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji snyed po
163b4(mdo): ba/ de ji snyed kyi skal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi 'kho/ rab phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los bsgyur pa'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 'thob par 'gyur/ 
163b5(mdo): der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed du/ tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag yu ma ra gnas yangs shi ba rgya che ba// lha'i gzhal/ 
163b6(mdo): myed kha pa rin po me lnga badran las byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ gyi rnams kyi rgyal rigs lAli rgya gzhi rgya che ba 'bum phrag tu ma thob par 'gyur// skye ba thams cad byung bar phyugs chen po thob par 'gyur/ 
163b7(mdo): tshe ring bar 'gyur// yun rib rgya 'tsho bar 'gyur spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur// tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa shin tu byame bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyus
163b8(mdo): lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i/ 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur// lha dang myi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhi nga rgya che ba thob par 'gyur// stobs che bar 'gyur// tshan po che chen po la stobs kyi shugs dang / ldan zhing gzugs
164a1(mdo): bzab par 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang / blta na sdug par dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad bya de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
164a2(mdo): rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu byed pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yom tan gyi phan yom 'di lta bu 'di dag mtho nas// myi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos
164a3(mdo): zla ba bsu par phyag dpag tshad brgyad pa/ dpag tshad stong du yab bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// yang 'di snyam lu/ de bzhim gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yangab dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs
164a4(mdo): rgyas shag kya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho bra ba 'dir 'jug par/ 'gyur ro// de ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bA ya ba dag par rdzog/ sa pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa// bdag gi rgyal po la po brang
164a5(mdo): 'dir ba sho so gsol par 'gyur ro// de ba bdag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang bdag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang myi mthum pa mnyan par bya'o// 
164a6(mdo): de bdag chos mnyam pa 'dis / bla ma byed pa yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par bya'o// de ba bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag tu ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// 
164a7(mdo): deb bdag gis/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bya ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyi myi khyab pa yangs shi rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro// deb bdag gis seMs
164a8(mdo): tsam dmyal kha ba/ rud 'grol skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgya ma pA pa 'gyur ro// deb bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
164b1(mdo): phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa pa'i sa khon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'thob pa/ dag gi b+hA pA'i sa khon bskyed par 'gyur// de ba bdag
164b2(mdo): gis 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus// bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gis dge ba'i rtsa pa bskyed par 'gyur ro// de bdag gis pa skal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bya ma pa
164b3(mdo): 'khor ba las yongs su tha dad par byas par 'gyur ro// des bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu myed pa bla na myed pa yangs shing rgya che ba// bsam gyis myi khyab pa yongs su bzub par 'gyur ro// 
164b4(mdo): deb bdag gis btsun mo 'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la bsrung dpa chen po byas par 'gyur ro// de bdag gis rgyal po'i pho phra ba 'di bzhi pa dang / ba de la legs su 'gyur ba/ bsam
164b5(mdo): gyis myi khyab pa// mchog tu khyad par bya 'phags pa bla ma byed pa byas par 'gyur ro// des khadag gis yul 'di thams cad kun tu bsrub par 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyangs pa dang / 
164b6(mdo): gnod pa myed pa dang / dgra byed pa dang / pha rol gyi dpag tshogs thams cad kyis myi rdzi ga dang / nad 'gro ba med pa dang / 'khrug pa myed par 'gyur ro// snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dag
164b7(mdo): dge slong dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdol sde'i dab pa po'i rgyal po 'dzind pa dag la myi'i rgyal po de dag dam pa'i chos la gus pa'i lta bus sti stang byed
164b8(mdo): bla mngapa byed ri mor byed/ mchod par byed cing rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi la dpung dpa g.yog tu bcas pa nga/ lha'i tshogs de dag dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag tu ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin ma
165a1(mdo): myi'i rgyal po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa med pa/ tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyag chen po bsam gyis myi khyab pa des// rnam par 'phel bar/ 
165a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la rgyal po la gzil brjid chen po bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang phun gsum tshogs pa dang / gzil brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba
165a3(mdo): thams cad dang/ dgra thams cad chos dpa bathun pas shind tu char chod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bkal sa la pa dang // bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
165a4(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gapa la la zhig myi'i rgyal po gyu ra da la de chos la gus pa de lta bus gser 'od dam pa mdo' sde'i/ dbar po la rgyal po nyan la/ dge slongang ma/ dge sloba'am/ 
165a5(mdo): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am// mdol sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang / sti lta du bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gro ba gyid cing / rgyal po chen po bdagacag gi slang bu
165a6(mdo): rgyal po la pho brang pe shi nang bya dag par phyag dpa bgyid// spos cha ba sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs papa 'debs la// bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig thun mob tu chos mnyam pa de nyan cing / 
165a7(mdo): bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad phyu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad cig sbyin par bgyid ma/ btsum pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de/ chos kyi snga ma la mchis ma thag tu/ myi'i rgyal po des
165a8(mdo): bdag cag rgyal po bzhi'i don kyi slad pu/ spos sna tshogs kyis bcug par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldama'ang sa/ gser 'od dam pa mdol sde'i dab pa po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa li slad tu/ brlag
165b1(mdo): pas bcugs ma thag tu / spos sna tshogs rnams las/ spos dang brlag pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag 'bru ba par 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig/ zang cig/ yud tsam// de la rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'i rab rang gi/ 
165b2(mdo): khab pa'i steng gi kha snga pa la / spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag gi gzugs rnams yongs su gnas par 'gyur// spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur// gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snapa pa 'byung
165b3(mdo): zhing / sdang ba des/ bdag cag gi khab pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis/ khar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang badrug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing dag/ skad cig/ za cig/ yud tsam de la rangar
165b4(mdo): gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis// de'i me de'i d+has/ dan/ tshig mthun pa dpe/ ngag mtham pa dang/ sgra skad mthun pas dge slong chos smrab// chos kyi khri stan la 'jug pa de la/ 'di skad
165b5(mdo): ces bka' stsalar to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ shing gi rgyal po'i
165b6(mdo): drang bya'adrug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par tu 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i rdul shugs dang / dkal thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi brlabs
165b7(mdo): dkal ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rgyam dag ston par 'gyur// skyes gradas pa khyod bya chub kyi snying po legs par brgyan pa byed par 'gyur ba dang skyes bu dam pa khod stob gsum gyi stong chen / 
165b8(mdo): li 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po la drub pu 'dug ste/ brgyad gyi sde bsam gyis myi khyab pa/ gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'jug pa/ 
166a1(mdo): myi sdug pa la stond pa// gzugs myi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa song ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
166a2(mdo): dpe' myed pa rab tu zhi ba/ rdul dang bral ba/ zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje li ba dam/ snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal po thams
166a3(mdo): cad kyis mngon par bstod pa// mchog tu zag pa bla na myed pa rnam pa bcu gnyis rab tu bskor bar 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla ma myed pa chub papa 'gyur// skyes bung pa pa khyod chos
166a4(mdo): kyi dung bla ma myed pa 'bud par 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis da chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgrengs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dmya pa/ khyod kyi chos kyi sgron ma bla na myed pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/ 
166a5(mdo): skyes bu ram la khyod chos kyi chang bla na byed pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'bum phrag bu ma las rgyal ba pa 'gyur// skyes bu la pa khyod sems
166a6(mdo): cam bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rtsam/ shin tu 'jigs su rub ba / 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya mamo las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag yum ra/ 
166a7(mdo): 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongs su thar par byed par 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa khyod / sangs rgyas bye ba/ khrag khrig 'bum phrag lum dag mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// 
166a8(mdo): de skad ces bka' stsal pa pa dang bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das myi'i rgyal po
166b1(mdo): gser 'od dam pa mdol sde 'i dbang po la rgyal po yom tan tshe 'ding pa ma 'ongs pa dang/ 'byab pa 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong ba/ sangs rgyas 'bum la dge ba'im pa bskyed pa/ bsod
166b2(mdo): rnams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa mtho nas/ snying rtse ba'i slad rtsa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po chen bzhi dpung dag g.yog tu
166b3(mdo): bcas pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag yum rang gi kha ma mchis pa dag tu/ spos dpag drug pa sna tshogs kyi na khri shi bdag gi gzugs kyis/ bskul ma thag tu
166b4(mdo): lus myi gang la bar bgyis te/ myi'i rgyal po de'i kha pa brtsegs pa / phyag dar ma mchis pa/ legs par phyag dar bgyis pa/ spos chab sna tshogs
166b5(mdo): kyis chag chag legs par btab pa rgyam sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho bra ga la ba deng/ chos mnyan pa'i srab rtsam mi bar bgyi'o// 
166b6(mdo): myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ lha rnams kyi dbang po larma byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang/ lha mo chem mo dpal dang sa'i lha mo brtan ma nga
166b7(mdo): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpo mchen po ya bdag shes dang
167a1(mdo): gnod skyon gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu za pa dang / 'phrog ma li bu lnga brgya
167a2(mdo): 2 'khor can dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu yi rgyal po rgya mtshol dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag/ lus myi gdal bar bgyis te/ myi'i rgyal po del po khra brgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de
167a3(mdo): ga la pa dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khra mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyand pa/ me tog bkram pa'is la bshams par 'gyur ba ga la ba der// chos mnyan pa'i slad du/ mtsho par 'gyur ro// 
167a4(mdo): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dbu dpa g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag tu ma de dgathams cad mthun par bgyis te/ myi'i rgyal po dge ba'i/ grogs
167a5(mdo): bgyid pa/ dge ba 'thob par bgyid pa/ bla na myed pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa chen po byin pa de la/ chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis rje ma par 'gyur ma thag tu/ myi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrub bar
167a6(mdo): bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bdel legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// myol rgyal po la po pra ba de dang / grong khyer de dang yul de yang kun
167a7(mdo): tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su khaskyar ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde la legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// chad la spa ba bar yang bgyi'o// yul de ya ba 'jig
167a8(mdo): pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go la dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su tha rad par bgyi'o// myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dpe/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang / 
167b1(mdo): lha ma chen mo nyan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po sa pa dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dab pa phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dngapa // 
167b2(mdo): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bza padapa/ 'phrog ma yu lnga brgya 'khor dang ldan pa dang / klu 'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang / klul rgyal po chen rgya mtsho la dang / de dag gi rab rang gi khang pa ste gi kha sngapa
167b3(mdo): sa byung ste/ spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis// khri ga go/ gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ khab pa rnams kyi napa tu gser du sA pa la 'byung bar
167b4(mdo): 'gyur zhing / snang ba des gnas thams cad sna ba bgyis khara'/ gyur ro// de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ kyis/ rgyal phye chen po bzhi la la 'ad skad ces bka' stsa la to// 
167b5(mdo): rgyal po chen po dag/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'o/ rang gi Sha pa pa na mas kyi ste pago ber sna pa la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri sho pe de dag/ gtugs rnams u gnas par ma zad do// de ci yi phyir
167b6(mdo): zhe na/ rgyal po chen po dag/ gyis rgyal po des// gser 'od dam ya mdol sde 'i dab pa po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos sna tshogs de dag gis bcugs ma thag tu/ lag la phog sdod cig thogs pa de
167b7(mdo): las/ spos dang / bcug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shi rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de skad cig/ thab cig/ yud tsam de ya/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po mi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na/ gapan lba ba
167b8(mdo): bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi me bye la phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dpa/ ril rgyal po raM rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'o rgyal po 'khor yug dang / 'khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / 
168a1(mdo): thib chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag zhargya dang / rgyal chen bzhis ris kyis bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum bsurtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nas// / 'du shes myed/ 'du shes myed sbyin du nye bar
168a2(mdo): so pos tha gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rim bye ba phrag brgya mo thams cad sa/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
168a3(mdo): hri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhal ldi dang / myo ma ci dpa/ lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyi/ rab rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khro shing do dag gtugs
168a4(mdo): rnams su gnas par gyurd/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ lha'i khab pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sna pa ya pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / sna ba des kyang lha'i kha pa pa
168a5(mdo): rnams snang ba byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na// lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la// spos dang bdug pa'i
168a6(mdo): khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo'i sngol dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ myi'i rgyal po des/ spos sna tshogs de dag gos/ bdugs ma thag tu/ gser 'od dam
168a7(mdo): pa mdol sngo'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzis brjid kyi mthus/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shi bdag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig/ zang cig/ yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ru
168a8(mdo): ma/ kang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'byam phrag tu ma/ ka pa g.yo klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi bar sna pa la// spos
168b1(mdo): dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shi pa rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag/ drag 'bum phrag d+ha ma la/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhi pa rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi
168b2(mdo): kha dog lta bu'i sna pa ba 'byung bar 'byung bar 'gyur/ sna pa des kyang sangs rgyas kyi san pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ ka pa ga li klung gi bye ma snyed dag sna ba byas par/ 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen
168b3(mdo): po dang / cho 'phrul chen po de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum/ phrag tu ma// kang gali klung ko bye ma snyed dag ma chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur/ skyes bu
168b4(mdo): pa logs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod gser 'od/ dam pa mdol sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshul 'di lta bu// zab/ mo'o don 'di lta bu/ zab mo snang ba 'di lta bu/ yon tan
168b5(mdo): bsam gyis/ myo khyab ya dang ldan pa 'di lta bu/ 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'dod pa khyod yang legs so zhes bya ba na 'a 'gyur ro// su tha na gser 'od dam la mdol sdo'i dab pa po la rgyas
168b6(mdo): po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan song dang ldan par myi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'chad pa dang / klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya cher yang dag
168b7(mdo): par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa/ gser 'od dam pa mdol sdom dbang po'i rgyal po 'ang thos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpas bye ba/ khrag khrig 'bum phrag ru ya
168b8(mdo): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pal byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas phyogs bcu la kun tu/ sangs rgyas kyi don pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ gang gal klung go bye ma snyed dag na/ 
169a1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/ gnas par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gapa la la zhig myi'i rgyal por gyurd te/ myi'i rgyal po de'i yul d+hu/ gser 'od
169a2(mdo): dam pa mdol sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'od byu ba la// btsun bcom ldan 'das/ myol rgyal po de dge slongang ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dgel ma gser 'od dam pa'i mdol sde la dbang po
169a3(mdo): rgyal po 'od 'dzond pa dag la bsti bstar myi bgyid/ bla mar myi bgyid/ ri mor myi bgyid/ mchod par myi bgyid na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag tu ma la
169a4(mdo): chos mnyam pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsil khu ba 'dis tshim par myi bgyid/ rim gro myo bgyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzil dan ya rnam par 'phel bar myi bgyid/ bdag cag gi brtson
169a5(mdo): grus dang / mthul dang stobs kyang myi skyed/ bdag cag gi yu sa la gzil brjid dang / dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yapa rnam par 'phel bar myi bgyid pa lags so// btsun pa bcom
169a6(mdo): ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba// khrag khrig 'bum phrag tu ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yul
169a7(mdo): de yal bar bor na yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyapa/ yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis de yal bar bor na/ yul der yul rnam par matrAn
169a8(mdo): ba gtsigs 'byung bar gyur // rgyal pa'i 'khrug pa kyi ba'ang pa/ kyi bzod pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bras na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang sal pa skye ba dang / sa pa zla ba phye ba dang / 
169b1(mdo): rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dngogs pa dpa' byed par 'gyur ba dang / gza' dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul tu 'byung bar/ 'gyur/ phyogs pa dad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur/ gza' dang / rgyu
169b2(mdo): skar rnams kyang / phan tshun myo mthun par dga' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla 'char na// nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang / nyi ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkhal
169b3(mdo): gnas pa yang / rtag par rgyun tu sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur// dus dus u nam mkha' la 'ja'i / khadog lta bu 'khyim par 'gyur/ sa yang g.yol bar 'gyur/ sa la gnas pa'i khron pa
169b4(mdo): yang sgra 'byin par drag par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur// char pa drag 'bab par 'gyur/ yul tu mu ge ya dang 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rol kyi dmag tshogs kyise yul
169b5(mdo): 'joms par 'gyur/ yul de phung bar 'gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams myi dgal bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
169b6(mdo): cag kyang rgyal po chen po bzhi la dpung dpa g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag tu ma dang / yul na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu rnams kyis de yal bar bor na/ yul de 'di ste gnod pa rnam pa sna tshog
169b7(mdo): brgya dang / gnod pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kapal la zhig myi'i rgyal por 'gyur la/ de bdag nyid la kun tu bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur// rgyal po li bdel ba sna
169b8(mdo): tshogs yun ring por myong bar 'gyur/ bde' pa thams cad bstabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur// yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bdel bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ pha
170a1(mdo): rol kyi dmag tshogs thams cad pham par bgyid/ 'tshal bar 'gyur/ yul thams cad tu yun rib tu yongs su skyob 'tshal bar 'gyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyurd/ rang gi/ 
170a2(mdo): yul yapa 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go dang / gakhrug pa thams cad las yongs su thard par bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ myi'i rgyal po des// gdon myi 'tshal par gser
170a3(mdo): 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po mo rgyal po 'di nyid mnyan par bgyid/ dge slong ram/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo' sde'i dbang po 'dzin na pa de dag ya yang bsti ba star bgyi// tha
170a4(mdo): mar bgyil/ rim gro bkyo/ mchod par bgyil/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi la dbu pa dpagayog tu bcas pa rnams kyang / chos mnyan pa'o/ dges ba 'i rtsa ba bsngags pa 'di dang / 
170a5(mdo): chos bdud rtsi'i khu pa 'dis tshim par bkye/ bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi' byin chen po ya pa/ rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o// de cimi slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
170a6(mdo): phyi'o rgyal po des gdon myi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdol sde 'i dab pa po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten
170a7(mdo): las 'das pa'i bstan chos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dab pa po brgya byin gyis/ bstan chos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / drang srob mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam
170a8(mdo): sna tshogs dag gis// sems can dag gi don gyi sra du/ 'jig rten la dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa yi bstan chos rnam pa sna tshogs pa ji snyed bstan pas dag pas ches mchog/ ces bya
170b1(mdo): du 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdol sde'i dbang pol rgyal po 'di ni// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ tshangs pa'i dbang po 'bum de dag dang / brgya byin bye / khrag khrig 'bum phrag tu dang / drang srong mngon par
170b2(mdo): shes pa lnga can// bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag thams cad las ches mchog/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas// sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du/ rgya cher yang dag par bshad pa lags so// 
170b3(mdo): ci nas kyang 'dzam bu klong thams cad na/ gnas pa'i myi rnams kyis rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ci nas sems can thams cad bdel bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas rab gi yul kun bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang
170b4(mdo): yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang / mi nas yul thams cad na gnod pa dang / dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas pa rol kyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste/ phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba
170b5(mdo): da / tsinas yule dag mnad 'go ba ma mchis shi pa/ 'khrugapa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas yul thams cad rtsa sa kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing myi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang/ 
170b6(mdo): nas myis rgyal po de dag gis/ rang rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron pa chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing snang bar bgyis te/ sna bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / mi nas lha'i khab khyim thams cad
170b7(mdo): lha dag dang / lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang / 'dzam bu glo pan gnas pa'i lha'i
170b8(mdo): tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang / rim gro bgyid par 'tshal ba dang / tsi nas bdag cag gi lha'i lus su 'di dag gzi'i byin chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / tsi nas bdag cag go lus la
171a1(mdo): brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu' chen po bskyed par 'gyur pa dang / tsi nas bdag k+ko/ lus la gzi'i brjod dang dpal dang / phun ga sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / 
171a2(mdo): nas 'dzam bu klong thams cad lo legs shing nyams dgal bar/ skye bo dang/ myo mang pos gang bar 'gyur ba dang / minas 'dzam bu gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bdel par 'gyur/ 
171a3(mdo): dang/ dgal ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas/ sems can thams cad skal pa khye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag tu mar lha dang myi'i bdel pa rgya che zhingapa/ rgya che ba dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang / 
171a4(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par/ 'gyur ba da / ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa yi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
171a5(mdo): 'gyur ba de dag thams cad da lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de pa zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa la dbang po bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bru
171a6(mdo): dag pas// ches 'phags pa'o thugs rje chen po'i stobs ldan pa'i byon gyi brlabs dang / rgya byin bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag go// lha'i shes pa pas ches 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyend pa zla na
171a7(mdo): myed pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig phrag tu ma thams cad pas ches 'phags pa la byon gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa ya bdag par
171a8(mdo): rdzogs pa'o/ sangs rgyas kyis// sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad d+ya/ gser 'od dam pa mdol sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ 'jam u l+li pa 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do// myo'o rgyal po/ 
171b1(mdo): yi dgongs pa dang rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag 'dzam bu gling thams cad nas mchis pa dang / gapa dag gis sems can da dag thams cad bdel bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad/ 
171b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdol sdol dbang po'i rgyal po 'ding nye bar bstan da/ yongs su brjod/ yang dag
171b3(mdo): par rab tu bshad do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rgyu dang / rkyen des/ myi'i rgyal po des// gdon myi 'tshal lar/ gser 'od dam pa mdol sde 'i dab pa po'i rgyal po 'ad// gus par mnyan par bgyi// gus
171b4(mdo): par rob gro bgyi/ gus par mchod par bgyi'o// de skad ces degasol da pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po/ bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal da to// de'i phyir rgyal po chen po/ 
171b5(mdo): khyed bzhis dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas// gdon myi za bar myo'o rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdol sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyen pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag
171b6(mdo): kun tu bsrub pas phyir spro ba cher gyis shig/ rgyal ba chen po dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam// dge bsnyen ma mdol sdem dbang po 'dzind pa 'di dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa/ 
171b7(mdo): 'dzind tu chug shig dang / de dag lha dang / lha ma yin tu bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di dag/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur// gser 'od// dam pa mdo sdemi dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya chem/ 
171b8(mdo): yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te// rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis ci nas mdol sde'i dab pa po 'dzind dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma bsrungs pa dang / 
172a1(mdo): gnod pa myed pa dang / nad myed pa dang / 'jug pa myed pa dang / sems bdel bar 'gyur zhing / gser 'od dam pa mdol sngol dab pa po la rgyal po 'di yang dag par rab ston par 'gyur// 
172a2(mdo): khar ga/ sa dge slong ram// dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam// dge bsnyen ma mdol sngo 'i dab pa po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu 'dzind pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya// / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzu ba/ 
172a3(mdo): dang / yongs su bskya pa dang / zhi ba dang/ bde la legs su 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi mu stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyis
172a4(mdo): ba'o// gzungs mchis la/ 'od// sems can gapa la la dag 'dzin/ cong 'chang bar mos pa de la/ bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis dpar 'gyur pa dang / rtag tu de la bdag gis bsru bzhi pa bskyab
172a5(mdo): de'i sdug bsngal thams cad bsal te/ bdel bar gnas par bgyi so// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyang skye bar bgyi lo// gang gzungs 'di 'dzind par 'dod pas lus bsru ba
172a6(mdo): phyir / sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// ma mo ba'i shar la na ya/ ma hA rA dzA ya/ tad d+ya thA/ ra ra ra pa/ ku no ku n+do/ Ta no Ta no// ru no ru no/ sa ba sa pa/ ka ra ka ra/ ma ha bi ka raM/ ma hA
172a7(mdo): lag ma hA radza/ rag sa rag gag tu mams tra sad wAnan sa An// bcom ldan 'das sngags 'dadi skud pa ka zo la/ sngags yan re bzlas zhos mdud pa lan re bor te/ de ltar lan btun byas
172a8(mdo): nas// dbu pa pa la btags mdonadade nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas kha pa dben pa yin pa cu/ khrus byas la gos ma pa ma gyon te/ spos ku yul dang / tsan dan dpa/ ka yu pa dang / tu rus ka dang / 
172b1(mdo): a ka ru dang pog kar po las bstsogs pa 'di cha mnyam par sbyar ba'i spos kyis mchod cing sngags 'di bzlas pas// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi lu s+yan drang bar bya'o// na mo khe la sha ra na ya/ ma
172b2(mdo): ha da na da ya/ tsan tra shA ra ya/ a ka sha/ A bi ro mo ta/ tsan de shwa ra/ ba ra maH/ ka r+ya ni/ ka sarba sad tA/ hi ta tsin ta/ ma ma tan bar d+ho/ bar rA sha sA ya ma?// ma ka ra sha swa tA// sngags 'di lan
172b3(mdo): bdun bzlas pa'i/ 'og tu// rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o// sngags 'di 'don pa'i slad du/ dkon mchog gsum dang/ rgyal po che na po rnam thos kyi bu la sngar phyag 'tshal bar bya'o// rgyal lo// 
172b4(mdo): chen po rnam thos kyi bu ni// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa skyong zhing nor sbyin pas/ sems can thams cad bdel bar mdzad pa 'i phyir/ yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di
172b5(mdo): bzlas na/ sems can de dag yod bzhin du bdel pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi s+yan sngarapa yod bzhin nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i
172b6(mdo): sngags kyi snying po 'di smras so// na mo rad ma tra ya ya/ na mo bol sha ra ba N+Da ya/ tad d+ya thA/ sa mo so i/ su u su yu/ tsan TA tsan/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ki l-i ki li/ ku ru/ 
172b7(mdo): ku ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ san dA yaH/ Ad ma nam/ nid t+yan/ an da ran d+ha se hA/ na mo bo la sha ra ba NA ya sA hA/ da na da ya sA hA/ ma nor tha ba ri pu ra swA hA/ sngags 'di sngar lan stong bzlas/ 
172b8(mdo): pa'i 'og tu / khapa pa dben pa'o// nang du lci bas dkyil 'khor chu ngu zhig byal te/ bshos ci 'byor par mchod pa bya'o// spos dam pa ba sregs pa 'i dru ba rgyun myi 'chad par bya zhipa/ nyin mtshan du sems/ 
173a1(mdo): rtse gcig pas// sngags kyi snying po 'di/ bdag kyis thos pa bdag gis thos pa tsam du bzlas pa na/ de nas rgyas po chen pa rnam thos bu'i sras 'dzin nar sha b+ha zhes bya ba gzhon tshul gzugs
173a2(mdo): kyis ka/ de'i gan tu me te/ nga'i yab la ci zhig gsol zhes 'dri bar byed do// de nas des bdag ni dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir nor zhig gsol gyis stsol cig ces smos shig/ de nas 'dzin napa/ 
173a3(mdo): shakhAs yab la gsold ya/ skyes bu dam pa zhig/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir/ nor zhig gsol lo zhes gsol pa dang / yab kyis khyod mya du so pa la// nyin cig bzhin pu ka ra sha pa na brgya brgya
173a4(mdo): byin cig par bka' stsa lad to// / de nas sngags sgrub pa des/ ltas de lta bu mthong nas/ don de grub par shes te// gnas/ dben par bad ka? gcig pu spos bsregs la/ nya la ka rar sngas su dri'i za ma tog
173a5(mdo): cig bzhag ste nyal bar bya'o// de phyin chad nang cig bzhin du/ za ma tog de yin pa nas/ nor ci byu ba ba las nor de de 'i nyin pa dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i lo byad me tog dang / spos dang
173a6(mdo): zhal zas las la stsogs khang sbyar ba dang / brel cing 'pho ngas la rnams la spyon zhing zad par bya'o// sems can thams cad la byams par bsam mo// khrob dpa'ache ba'i bsam pa bskyed na/ de nyams par
173a7(mdo): 'gyur las// khro ba'i sems myi skye bar rtag tu bsrung bar bya'o// de nas yang sngags 'di 'dzind pa des nyin cig bzhin du lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / bzhan yang sras dang/ sras mo la 'khor du ba
173a8(mdo): pa la rtag par bsam zhing bstod pa dang / bsngags par bya'o// rtag par dge ba bcu 'i las kyi lam gyis stong zhing// lha la bstsogs pa rnams mthul dpa bsod nams mngon par 'phel sa dang / dge la/ 
173b1(mdo): rgyas pa dang / bla na myed pa la byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// lha de dag kyis de ltar byed pe mthong nas// kun dgal zhib mgul rangs pas 'ong zhipa de la bsrung ba dang / skyob par byed do// sngags pa
173b2(mdo): de nyid kyang / che lo dpag tu myed par gnas shing / ngan song gsum yongs su spang ba dang / bgegs dang bar chad thams cad kyang myed par 'gyur ro// yid bzhin nor bu 'di dag dang / gter bzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro// 
173b3(mdo): rdzu 'phrul lo dbang sgyur zhing / bsam pa thams cad kyang thub par 'gyur rokra/ gal te longs 'apyod can du 'dod na yang / yid de bzhin du grub pa dang / bya dang gcan zan gyi skad thams cad kyang shes par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
173b4(mdo): 'dabag sngags sgrub pa des bdag mthong bar 'tshal na/ ches brgyad me ma/ tshes bcol lnga la nyon par/ ras kar po la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ka pi ta dang / sbyar ba 'i tshon rtsis rgyan sna tshogs
173b5(mdo): kyos brgyan pa/ ri mo 'aShan gsol sbyin gyi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas kyi g.yon phyogs su ni dpal gyi lha mo'i gzugs bri sangs rgyas kyi g.yas phyogs su ni/ rgyal ba chen po rnam thos kyi bu
173b6(mdo): bdag bu smad dang / la ror bu bcas par bris te/ gnas deng bkram nas// bye tog sna tshogs dang / dri mang po dang / mar me dam pa dang / zhas zas padam pa sna tshogs kyis nyin mtshan rgyun myi 'acod par bya'o// sngags
173b7(mdo): 'di zlos pas kyi g.yeng bar bya zhing / rgyal po chen po nam thos kyi bu spyan drab pa'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o// na mon ri kon Tha ya/ b+han d+ha ya/ na mo po la shra ba na ya/ sa krA sha rA dzA ya/ ma hA ra / ma hAH
173b8(mdo): dza ya na ma gri a yAM/ ma hA de byi ye/ tad d+ya Tha// ta ra ta ra/ tu ru tu ru / ga ra ba la/ su gud do// ha na ha na/ ma tri ka na ka/ bad badz+ra b+he d+ha rA/ mu ka ga ti ka/ a ya pakra ta sha/ rI rA a/ lto sa pra sad tA/ 
174a1(mdo): hi ta ka mabe ni she ra ba Na/ shra yA de bi pra b+ha ya/ e hi e hi/ ma gI lam pa/ g+ha ra Na g+ha ra Na// ba ra s+ya// ba ra s+ya// da da ti me ma/ da ri sha na ka ma s+ya// da rau sha na ma ma ma na/ pralta da ya swa ha// 
174a2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngags zlos pa de dang / mchod pa rgya chen po mthong nas/ bdag byams pa dang / dga' ba'i bsam pa skyes nas/ bdag de'i mdun du// byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs sam/ yang rgan po 'am
174a3(mdo): dge slong gi gzugs su byas te/ bdag lag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu gser gyi snod dang bcas pa thogs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ lus kyis gus pa ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tu brjod de/ 
174a4(mdo): sngags 'khan de la 'di skad ces smra'o// khyod ci dang ci 'dod pasgo bde thams cad grub par byas te// nags tshal dben par 'gro 'dod pa 'am// nor bu rin po che 'dod pa 'am/ myo ma pa po ma yid tu/ 
174a5(mdo): 'ong bar 'dod pa 'am/ gser dang/ dngul las spogs pa la nor 'dod pa 'am/ sngags bzhan sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa 'amardzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa dang / tshe rib ba pa 'dod pa dang / 
174a6(mdo): sman bcud kyis len 'dod pa 'am las spogs pa thams cad bsam pa bzhin du grub par bya'o// bdag gi dngos po de dag la stsogs pa mdol tsam zhig smos par zad kyi de ma yin pa gzhan zhig 'dod na yang thams
174a7(mdo): cad bsam kha bzhin du yongs su grub par bya ste/ rin po che'i gter myi bzad pa dang / bsod nams tshad myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dper na nyi zla 'di sa la ltung bar 'gyur ba dang / sa chen po 'di bzhin tu
174a8(mdo): yang 'gyur ba'i dus ni yod kyang srid kyi/ bden pa'i tshig 'di ni rnams kyang slu bar myi 'gyur bas/ rtag tu bdel ba dang / yid bzhin du spyod longs pa thob par bya'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das mdol lde/ 
174b1(mdo): rgyal po 'di gangapa zhig 'dzind cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing 'don pa yang rung / sngags 'di sgrub pa'ang rungab ste/ tshegs chub dus myur du grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis// sems can dbul
174b2(mdo): zhing 'phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams kyi ched du sngags 'di bshad pas/ des phyug cing bdel ba'i mchog dang / pun gsum 'tshogs pa tshe gcig tu 'byor par 'gyur ro// bdag gis kyang de yongs su
174b3(mdo): bsrung zhir bskyab pa'i phyir// rjes su 'brang zhing gnod pa dang / mtshel ba thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o// gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang pos rgyal po de 'dzind cing rgyas par byed pa dang / 
174b4(mdo): sngags 'di 'chang pa'i keng zag de gom pa brgya tshun chad 'od kyi snang ba byas ste/ bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin stong rnams kyang da/ rtag tu de'i g.yog tu bskol zhong ma ngag gzhug yid bzhin du byed du
174b5(mdo): gzhug go// bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'di sku ba myed par yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs su gsol// / de nas rgyalapo chen po rnam thos kyi lus sngags de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom
174b6(mdo): ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bkal rtsal te/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sems can thams cad sred pas gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba thams cad dral bas// phyag zhi pa bdes par bya ba'i byor/ sngags 'di
174b7(mdo): smras pa dang // gzhan yang mdo'i sdel 'di 'jig rten du yongs su rgyas pa 'i byor/ sngags bshad pa ni leg po legs ma// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar/ 
174b8(mdo): byas mo g.yas pa'i lta pas la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ de mi tshamangon gsum du tshul dang mthun pa 'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis/ 
175a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba zla ba dri ma myed pa'i sku// rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od// rgyal ba pad ma dri ma myed pa'i sman// rgyal ba mye tog pad rtsa rtul myed khasam// 
175a2(mdo): tsha rgyal kha'i yon tan rgya mtshol lta bu ste// rin po che ni tu ma'i 'byung gnas gyur da// rgyal ba rgya mtsho la ye shes chu 'os gang // ti pe 'dzind/ brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang // rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor los bris pa ste// 
175a3(mdo): 'khor lo mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong // phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas sbas pa ste// zhabs kyi dra ba dang pa'i dbang po bzhin// gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu ka dang // rgyal ba dri myed gser gyi ri dbang po// yon
175a4(mdo): tan thams cad ri dab pa 'dra ba ste// sangs rgyas ri dab nga rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba chu zla 'dra// nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste// sgyu ma spyig rgyu lta
175a5(mdo): bur chags myed pa// rgyal ba dri ma myed la phyag 'tshal lo// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// rgyal po chen po bzhi la tshig sa u bcad de bka' stsa la pa// stobs bcul dag gi gser 'o/ 
175a6(mdo): dam pa'i// mdol sdel dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di// 'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni// brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya// 'di ltar mdol sde dkon mchog zab mo 'di// 
175a7(mdo): sems can kun la bdel ba sprin byed pa// sems can rnams la phan dang bdel ba'i phyir// 'dzam u kli pa 'dir yun ring gnas/ par 'gyur// 'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi/ 'jig rten dag/ 
175a8(mdo): na ngan song sdug bsngal dang // sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnaMs kyi ni// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa yin// 'dzam gling 'di ni 'dzam rming gnas pa'i// rgyal po gang dag yin pa thams cad
175b1(mdo): kyis/ rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni/ chos rnams kyis ni yul dag bskyangs par bgyi// gang gis 'dzam bu gling 'di bdel ba dang // shi nad tu lo legs nyams kyang dkar 'gyur zhi pa// 'dzam bu
175b2(mdo): gling ni thams cad dag na yang // sems can thams cad bdel par 'gyur bar gyis// yul la dag la dang bdag de dga' ba dang // rgyal srid rnam par 'byor da pa dga' ba des// mdol sde dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya// 
175b3(mdo): mdo' sde dbang 'di mchog tu dge ba byed// pha rol da dgra ni yang dag zad par byed// pha rol da dmag tshogs zlog byed dge ba byed// mchog tu 'jigs pas 'phongs pa sel bar byed// dper na rin chen shing ljon par
175b4(mdo): mdzes pa// yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar// rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang // mdol sngol dbang po martsog 'di de ltar blta// dper chu grang skom pa sel byed pa// tshabs
175b5(mdo): nyams lag de ni rnyed pa ltar// yon tan dag gis skos pa'i rgyal tho ya// mdo sde'i dab pa po mchog 'di de bzhin no// dpe na rin chen thags cad 'brub ba mi gnas// rin chen snod na
175b6(mdo): 'thil yod pa ltar// myo'o dab pa pom tshogs la gser 'od mchog/ mdo sngo yi dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// 'di ni lha'i tshogs kyis/ mngon mchod pa// mdol sngol dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pa// 'jig rten
175b7(mdo): skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po la// bzhis po dag gis kun tu bsrungs pa yin// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // mdol sde mo dbang po 'di na rtag tu dgongs// mdol sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad pa na/ 
175b8(mdo): sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ legs shes brjod pa byin// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu la dag tu yul yang srung bar byed// rab tu dga' zhi pa rab tu mgu'/ sems kyis// mdo' sde'i
176a1(mdo): dbang po 'di ni nyan par khyed// 'dzam khu rmi pan/ gnas par 'gyur ba'i// lha'i tshogs rnams bsam gyis myi khyab pa// lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dgal bas// mdom sde yi dbang pa po 'di ni nyan par
176a2(mdo): byed// chos rnams nyan par bya ba 'di'i sa ni// gzi'i brjid dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus thob// gzi'i' byin chen po yis lte'i lus// shi nad tu rgyas shi pa rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po
176a3(mdo): bzhis// bcom ldan 'das las tshigs u bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur da/ rmad tu byung bar gyurd/ dga' bar gyur da te/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis/ yud/ tsam zhig dus nas/ mchil ma
176a4(mdo): phyis te/ de dag lus 'phar yan lag 'ad zhi pa dgal ba dang / bden ba dang / yid bdel ba bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur// yang bcom ldan 'das la// lha'i me tog man da la dag gis gtor da/ 
176a5(mdo): mngon par gtor/ gtor da/ mngon par gtor nas kyang / stan rnams las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha pas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
176a6(mdo): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'i/ rgyal po chen po ro re ya nga/ gnod sbyin lnga brgya dang / chos smra ba de
176a7(mdo): bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa'i slad du/ rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brab bar bgyi'o// gal te mdol sde 'di las/ tshig gi don 'ag zhig brjed par gyurd na ya pa/ bdag cag gis de la dran pa dang / 
176a8(mdo): myi brjed pa la mchog gi gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// mdos sdom dbang po 'dage la/ bzhugs pa'i gnas de dag gi sems can rnams kyis yongs u rgyas par byed pas// nams kyang nub par
176b1(mdo): myi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor 'dus pa de dag la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sems can de dag gis/ ye shes dang // spobs pra dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu myed pa/ 
176b2(mdo): thob pas// nyon mongs pa spangs pa la ba de la gdang ldan te/ bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas zhib 'khor ba yongs su spangs te/ bla na myed pa la byang chub las phyir myi ldog par myur du thob par 'gyur ro// 
176b3(mdo): gser 'od dam pa mdo sdel dbang po'i rgyal po las// / rgyal po chen po bzhis yul 'khor yongs su bskyangs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o//

176b5(mdo): sems dpal chos thams cad la bsgoms pa rnams kyi ma dang / byang chu sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpal yongs su 'dzind pa yin no// de skad ces bka' su la pa dang / bcom
176b6(mdo): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dA ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs ni/ yul ni myi gnas/ phyogs na myi gnas pa lags na// bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi tshig gi
176b7(mdo): don dag pa lags / de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da tili bu la/ 'di skad ces bka' sru lad to// sha ra da ti'i bu 'di ltar khyod theg pa chen yo la gnas pa dang / theg pa chen po la
176b8(mdo): pa dang / theg pa chen po la lhag par bya ba byas pa yaM ne na/ sha ra da ti'i khu dzi ltar khyod// gzungs ni yul na myaM gnas phyogs na myi gnas shi pe chos kya pa ma yin/ chos ma yin pa ya ma yine/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ 
177a1(mdo): da ltar byang pa yang ma yin / dngos po can yang ma yin/ dngos po myed pa yang ma yin/ rkyen las byung ba yang ma yin/ rkyen myed pa las byung ba mi yin/ 'gro ba myed pa las byung ba yang ma yin/ chos ka pa la la
177a2(mdo): gi skye ba yang ma yin// 'gog pa yang ma yin par ston mod kyi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi
177a3(mdo): bslab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ chags pa myed pa'i gzungs shes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs sgrub pa'i lam gyi rigs pa dang / stobs kyi gnas stond pa legs so// legs
177a4(mdo): so// de skad ces bka' stsald pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bus/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gzungs thob pas ka pa la gnas na/ byang chub sems/

177b1(mdo): nyan par byed pa dang / ga padag gzungs 'di 'chad par byed pa dang / kang dag mos par byed pa de rnams la byang chub kyi sems dpam bral bas/ sangs rgyas la ji ltar mchod pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa til bu gzungs

178a1(mdo): bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro// de ci yi phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la shwa pa myed de gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum yin no// 
178a2(mdo): 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdol sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ chags myed pa'i gzungs shes bya ba'i le'u ste/ bcu la gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/

178a8(mdo): srungs shig swa ha// ye ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen po/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzhigs dbang phyugs khor de nyid su 'dus par gyur pa te/ 'dus pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//

178b5(mdo): pra ni/ re ra/ ma ti ma ti/ su ma ti / ma ha ma ti/ tA tA tA tA/ khyod la sdig pa khyed kyis ma 'jigs shig ces la ka na rdo rjes smras kyis/ drA bi rdza sahA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsrung

178b8(mdo): ba'i ad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/ gzungs kyi gas pa sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ hi li mi li tsi l-i swA hA/ pra mA swa re sA hA/ pra m+b+ha kar+N+Ne pu shA sa pasta re sA tA/ 
179a1(mdo): oM bcom ldan 'das/ 'dadi ni bdag gi/ bsru ba pa tshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/ dus ma lags pa'i 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi khar bgyid pa

179a3(mdo): rnam grangs 'ad la// gzungs kyi zhes pa sngags tshig rnams bgyi so// 'di lta ste/ mi ga ni/ b+han d+ha ma dan / ma ti ta/ ti/ ko rak+Shan d+ha ri/ tsan / ma ta kyo ba ran/ e hi na ma d+ha ma d+ha raH/

179a5(mdo): par bgyid pa// dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad yongs u skyob pa lags so// / de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor sru pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / myig myi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po
179a6(mdo): rnam thos kyi khus/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang skye bo ma pa po la pham pa dang / 
179a7(mdo): skye bo ma pa po la bdel ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rtse ba 'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gas pa sngags kyi chog rnams brjod par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ bu b+he/ pu shwe/ d+hu ma pa ro ta re a r+ya pra sha ste/ 
179a8(mdo): nau rgya ka te/ ma pa ga e/ stu te/ sta bi te/ swa hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na rgyal po chen po bzhi la bdag cag gi bsrung ba/ 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bas+yaiHste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las/ 
179b1(mdo): kyi 'jigs lar bapyod pa// che skyob la/ dus ma lags par bkram pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so// de nas klu 'i rgyal po rgya mtshos dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klus rgyal po ma dros pa dang
179b2(mdo): klu'i rgyal po/ glogs rtse dang / klu'i rgya la po 'od zer brgya pas/ bcom ldan 'das ga a kha de logs u thal mo sbyar la btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag go/ 
179b3(mdo): bsrung ba chen po yod bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba// klog thams cad zlog pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad sel ya/ drug rnams myo gad+hag par bgyid la gsheg byed pa// dang / byad sdem dang / ro
179b4(mdo): la ngaga'ang/ ba kra myaM shes pa 'jigs par bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu 'i skye gnas 'di nas byung dadapa/ ser sna spab ba'i slad du// thugs rtse bar dgongs te/ bzhes/ 
179b5(mdo): su gsol// de cos slad du she na/ bcom ldan 'das yang ga cag klu rnams sa ser sna can te// sems ser snas la skor ba lags so// sod sa ste/ sa la sa/ ma ma re/ a hA
179b6(mdo): a krA yAM/ pu Ne/ par+ya pa twe/ swa rba pA la/ pra sha ma no yai A hA/ a r+ya pu N+ya// swa ba// ka ye swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gas pa sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag skyes pa 'am khud myed ka pa / 
179b7(mdo): la'i lce la/ 'don tam/ yi ger bris pa de lang/ glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// rtsa ba'i du ka ka ma/ mchel ba'i chug gam/ dbyig dug gam// ka pa dag/ bzhan ya pa yan lag
179b8(mdo): las byung ba'i drug gis de gum pa'i rjes bgyid par myo 'gyur ro// bdag 'jigs pa thams/ cad/ dpa/ gnod pa thams cad las bdel bar gyurd cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / 
180a1(mdo): tshangs pa dang / mjig rten skyong la dang / gru'i rgyal po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzangs dka/ khyed skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo ma po la ba des pa la zhugs te/ chos kyi/ 
180a2(mdo): rnam grangs 'di rjes su yongs u bzung ba'i phyir// drA bi r+No legs pa sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad pa legs so// legs so// / phyogs rnams na gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa rnams bskung
180a3(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa lad nas/ dge' slong de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / klu'i bdag po de dag dang / sta dang / myi da pa/ 
180a4(mdo): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yid rangs te mngon par bstod/ do// // gser 'od dam pa mdol sdol
180a5(mdo): dbang po'i rgyal po las yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi le'u ste/ bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis// bla gos phrag pa gcig
180a6(mdo): tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha pa sa la btsugs nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs u thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
180a7(mdo): 'das / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang / dge slong chos smra ba de ma tshig brgyan pa'i slad du/ spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gise brjod pa kun tu bzhag par bgyi/ dge slong
180a8(mdo): chos smra ba de la// shes pa'i sna bas chen po bgyil/ gser 'od dam pa/ mdol sde li dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las/ tshig gam/ oM ke ga pa ya ba ru pa ba dag cig yongs u nyams par gyur da tam bsgyur na/ bdag
180b1(mdo): gis dge slong ches smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang / tshi ge dpa ta gi yi ge de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// mi nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum dag la// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de/ dag gi
180b2(mdo): don gyi slad rung // ser 'od dam pa mdol sde li dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu gling na/ yun ripa tu gnas shing / mya pur+ya nub par myi 'gyur ba dang / sems can du ma dag gos/ gser 'od dam pa mdos sde la
180b3(mdo): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di zlos nas// shes rab rno pa bsam gyis myi khyab par 'gyur ga da / shes rab kyi phu pa po bsam gyis myi khyab pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la/ tshe phun gsum tshogs pa rab tu
180b4(mdo): sna tshogs phun gsum 'tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / baspyad pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la gzungs kyang dam la bar bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de dang/ sems can chos
180b5(mdo): nyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du/ sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i// chus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/ gza' dang rgyu skar dang / skye ba dang / 'chi ba 'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtog pa dang / 'khrug yo pa dang / 
180b6(mdo): zhig la zug dang / rmyi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byad dang ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gapags mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du stsal da pa'i smang+ga dang / sngags ni 'di
180b7(mdo): dag steshru dga' 'ge'u dzar spr-i ka dang / a mya sha mya ka ri she/ in dra ta sta skal ba che// dza ya shau pa tsa a ga ru// shaM ro be sta sra sr-il po ka// ku gu la ras sha la la kiM// rdo dreg lo ma rgya spos dang // 
181a1(mdo): tsan dan dang ljo ras dang // 'go'u wa bcas yuta dang // bur kum tha skang yungs kar dang // spyi mo uka smel na la da// na sha/ gye sar u shaM re// 'di dag cha ni mnyam la byis nas// 
181a2(mdo): skar ma rgyal la btab par bgyi// phye ma/ la na sngags tshig 'di/ yan kha rgya mngon par gdab par bgyi// tad d+ya thA/ su twe/ kri SheH/ ka ma ta l-i na li// dza na ka ra te/ dA pa ka ra Ne/ in dra dza yaM
181a3(mdo): sha kad dwe/ bshad dre/ a ba ra rta/ ka sau kai na/ ku tra ku ka l-i la/ ka li sa ma ti/ shi la a ti san g+ni/ d+hu d+hu ma ya ti/ shi ri sha ri/ sad t+ya/ s+thi te sAhA/ lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis
181a4(mdo): nas nikaMme tog/ saM langam bkram par bgyi// gser gyi snod da pa ngul snod du// mngar ba'o/ khu ba bzhag par bgyi// skyes bu go cha bgos par bgyi// bzhi zhig de yang bzhag par
181a5(mdo): gyi/ rab tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi la// bum pa thogs la/ bzhag par 'gyi// rtag tu gu kul bdug par bgyi/ sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du u lad// gdugs dang rgyal ma
181a6(mdo): badzin gyis/ lha mo de ni legs par brgyan// ba ra bar dag tu me lo bzhag/ mda' dang mdu rtse rna smra bzhag/ de nas 'tshams kyang bcad par bgyid// de'i 'og tu dgos pa brtsam/ 
181a7(mdo): sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis// 'tshams la cad pa yapa brtsam par ba kyi// sad ya the dan/ a ra ke/ na yA ne/ hi lI/ mi le/ gi le/ Shi khi leTaH/ swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
181a8(mdo): snam logs su/ khrus bgyis nas// sngags 'di bzlas brjod pagyis na// khrus kyis zhi kha ra sbyar ro// tad d+ya tha/ seg dre/ bi ga de/ bi ka ta ba ti sAhA// phyogs bzhi dag na/ ga pa gnas
181b1(mdo): rgyas pa bdag gi sa srungs gis// btsal la'i skam ma'i gnod pa dang // phupa las kyi 'jigs byung dang // lhung po khams rnams ma zugs la pyod la// 'jigs pa gyi ba'ang/ 
181b2(mdo): 'gyur cig/ sa e 9 me mAm+b+ha/ sa ka he/ ka k+She/ swA hA/ rA ka yas sa/ b+h+yaHta a A hA/ skan d+ha ma tA ya mAd+ha/ ni la ka na/ a A tA// ma la ra dzi tA wi r+ya ya sa hA/ 
181b3(mdo): pad las b+huH ta ya swA hA/ ma di mi la bag tA a sa hA/ na mo b+ha ka la te/ bra ma rje sems ma sa kye de khyi mau rgyan tu mam tu ba da/ tam rba swA nu sa ma tra satwa// dge slom chos smra
181b4(mdo): de bsrung ga dang / chos nyan pa de dag dang/ yi ker bris pa de dag gi don kyi slad tu// khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid der/ mchil bar bgyi'o// lha'i tshogs thams cad dang lhan con/ 
181b5(mdo): tu/ grob ngam/ grong khyer ram/ kro ba rdal lam// rtsug lag Sha der nad thams cad rab tu zhi khar bgyi'o// ci zhes dge slong ma/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdor tsA
181b6(mdo): yi dab pa po 'dzin la de dag gi srogasas phan gdags par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las byung ba 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi sdog par 'gyur pa dang / myur tu
181b7(mdo): bla na myed la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar/ gzal dang / 'thab pa dang / rtog pa dang bcas pa 'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang / phyi la ma ngan pa dang / lod
181b8(mdo): 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byad dang / ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can lu/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can khyod/ skye go mang po la
182a1(mdo): phan kha dang / skye bo mang po la bdel pa'i phyir zhugs te/ khyod kyi sngags dpag sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni legs so legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha mo/ 
182a2(mdo): dbyangs can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la/ phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas slob dpon lupa stond pa bram ze ko'u di ne n+yas/ lha mo dbyangs can de bkug go// lha mo chen mo
182a3(mdo): dbyangs can mchod 'os dka' thub che// 'jig rten kun tu rnam grangs mchog sprin yon tan che// rtser gnas mdzes ma dar g+har+Na 'i se gos bkrus pa// / dar b+ha 'i rtse'i gos gon rkang pacig gis gnas// 
182a4(mdo): lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'di skad ces smras te// / sems/ can rnams la dge ba'i tshig shod lce khrol 'jog// sad ya the dan/ mu rI/ tsi re/ a la dze/ a ba dza ya ti
182a5(mdo): hi ku e/ myo gu we/ bi rig sa la ti/ myong gu She/ ma riH/ swa ma ti/ di sha ma tau/ a gr-i ta ma krI/ tar tsi ta ta ra/ tsa ga tau/ y-i/ nI rI m-i ri/ ma ri tsi/ prA Na ye/ lo ka dze sh+le/ 
182a6(mdo): lo ka shwen+te/ lo ka pra ye/ sid d+ha pra te/ b+hi sa mu 'gro tsa tsa li/ a pra tita ta bud d+hi/ na u / sa ha tsa/ sa ha de yi/ pra ti kr-in/ nam ska ras// bdag ga khro thogs pa myed pa gyur cig
182a7(mdo): bstan bcos dang / tshigs su bcad la sa rgyu dang / sde snod dang / snyan dngags la s+yokas la la/ bdag ki rig sngags dngos grub tu gyurd cig/ tad a tha/ ma ta pra b+ha ba/ ti li ti lo/ mi li mo/ 
182a8(mdo): i// bcom ldan 'das ma/ lha mo dbyangs can gyi mthus/ bdag rnam par rgyu bar gyurd cig/ ke rA te/ ke yuSh+pa re/ ke yu'u ra ma ti/ ti l-i mi lo// mi li mo l-i/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa
182b1(mdo): dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden ga dang / dbang po'i bden pa dang / chu lhal bden pas/ lha mo chen mo dkug par bya'o// kaMpa dag 'jig rten na bden pa smra ba de dag kau bden pa dang / 
182b2(mdo): bden pa'i cho ga gis lha mo chen mo dgug par bya'o// tad ya tha/ hi li mi li / ti li m-i i/ hi li mi yi/ bdag rnam par dag par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can la phyag
182b3(mdo): 'tshal loka/ bdag la gsapa sngags kyi tshi ga rnams grub par gyur da/ cig swa hA// de nas lha mo dbyangs can gyis/ sngags kyi cho ga de smras nas/ yang bram ze ko'u di n+ya la/ 'di skad ces smras so// 
182b4(mdo): skyes khu chen po khyod/ sems can thams cad spobs pa dam padang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par shes pa dang / shes rab che ba dang / nor dang/ dbyig las brtsogs pa sbyin pas phan 'dogs
182b5(mdo): sha myur du bla na myed pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa legs la legs lo// mdol 'di 'dzind pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyi her/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gzungs 'di
182b6(mdo): dang por su 'don pas// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal te// 'khrul pa myed par bzlas byas na// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams dang dam chos dang / 
182b7(mdo): byang chub rang rgyal nyan thos dang // tshangs la dang ni brgya byin dang // rgyal chen bzhi la phyag 'tshal zhingapa// rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa yang // rim gro gus par khasam byas te// zhi la dben pa'i gnas
182b8(mdo): u ni// sgra bskyed gzungs dpa bstod la yang // ji snyed sangs rgyas lha klu la/ mchod pa rgya chen bsham par bya// skye bo'i rigs zhim pa po la// snying rje'i sems kyang bskyed par bya// bcom ldan/ 
183a1(mdo): gser mdog mtshan rab can// rtse gcig sems kyis bsam bya zhing // bcom ldan gsu rab dam chos kyis// dbang po so sor nges mdzad pa'i// de la tshig don legs bsams te/ 
183a2(mdo): stong nyid sgrub la'ang gnas par byos// bcom ldan thams cad mngon gsum du// rtse gcig sems kyis bsam byas na// ting nge 'dzind dang ye shes dang // gzungs mchog dam pa thob par
183a3(mdo): 'gyur// bcom ldan dpal 'gur gsung chos kyis// dam pa'i dbyangs des 'khor rnams 'dul// ljags kyis stor gsum khyengs mdzad cing // so sor ci rogs ya mtshan ston// de lta'i
183a4(mdo): gsung mchog dam pa9// rtaka khar la sam/ zhi pa 'dzagapa spa ba// bsam myi khyab pa yi ljags mtshan 'di// smon de lam rgya chen dbangapagis brnyes// chos rnams myed par ston mdzad
183a5(mdo): pa/ ji ltar mkhas la ma chags bzhin// sangs rgyas sngags mtshan gsupa smra la// de lasams smon lam chad byed 'grub// gang zhig dbyangs can mngon mchog dam// yang na spos/ 
183a6(mdo): mas man ngag bzhin// sub bzhin chos de gapa bsgrub pa// bkur sti mchog rnams sog par 'gyur// gang zhig ye shes mchog sgrub pa 'ang// rtse gcig sems kyis chos 'di bzung // bsod nam
183a7(mdo): ye shes tshogs 'phel zhing // nges par 'brub la yod gnyis spongs// / gang zhig nor bsgrub nor ldan dang // khye dang grags pa 'am de bzhin bsgrub// 'byung bar 'dod pa 'pharnam grol bar/ 
183a8(mdo): nges par 'grub par yid gnyis spongs// yon tan mang po tshad myed pa'ang // bsam pa bzhin du kun 'grub pas/ 'di la tshul bzhin ka pa gnas pa// / nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis
183b1(mdo): spongs// dben par gtsa ma'i gos gyon te// dkyil 'khor ci ran byas pa der// byam pa rgyas pa bzhi bzhag ste// / dus bzhon me tog bcug pas mchod// pa dan gdugs dang lnga ldi preka/ 
183b2(mdo): bye ma khrug las rgyas par brgyan// sangs rgyas dang ni dbyangs can mchod// lha de mthong 'dod/ mthong bar 'gyur// dbyangs can lha mo de mdun cu// zhag/ bdun gsum du bzlas brjod de// gal te
183b3(mdo): g+ha de ma mthong na/ bsam la brtan pas zhag dgur bzlas// de'i nub yo'apam mthong na/ gzhan du shis pa mi gnas btsal te// tshul bzhin lha mo gzugs bris la// mchod cing bzlam
183b4(mdo): brjod rgyun myi gcod// bdag dang bzhan don tshad myedadal// nyin mtshan rgyun du brtson bskyed de// de'i 'bras bu bzhan la stobs// des ni bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// de
183b5(mdo): ste 'ang bsam la ma grub na// zla ba gsum dang drug dang dgye// yang na brtson pas lor bzlas na/ mngon shes drug las pasdogs pa 'ang mthog// de nas bram/ 
183b6(mdo): be ko'u di skyes// de skad ces bshad pa thos nas// dga' ga dang / rangs pa tshad myed pa skyes te/ 'khor 'dus pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha dang byilas ba sdogs pa ma 'khor
183b7(mdo): mas cad kyis// sems ma g.yengs par bdan la nyon cig dang // bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa sa brten te/ dbyangs can lha mo mchog la bstod pa'i phyir// tshigs su bcad de smra bar 'phyir/ 
183b8(mdo): phyag 'tshal lha mo mthul chen la// 'jig rten khams 'dir dbang brnyes pa // sngon gyi drapAg+nis bshad yA// de phyir bdag gis khyod la bstod// dpal ldan thugs ni bdel ba dang // thos 'dzin mdzes
184a1(mdo): ldan grags ldan pa// 'jig rten 'di skyed yul yang yin// rtag tu dpal la brtson chen myod// g.yul gyi gnas as rtag tu rgyal// snying rje bzod la tshul bas bskyed// gshin rje'i khro ba mo
184a2(mdo): lus stond tsa pe// rtag tu dang gos sngon po mnapas// mdzes dang myi mdzes kun ston cing // s+yan myig us mthong sdar ba bskyed// spyod pa tshad myed 'jig rten 'das// skyabs su u 'ongs rjes su 'dzind// 
184a3(mdo): bar dgal pa dang brag la gnas// bar gaphug dang tshu'i 'gras// yang na sngon sdong nags rnams u// gnas de dag ni lha mo 'i rten// ji ltar khrigs myo rnams kyis// ma bya'i mdongs las gdugs byas sho pa// 
184a4(mdo): rtag tu lha mode/ mchod na// thams cad nus su 'jig rten skyob// stag dang sed shes 'khor byas shi // bya dang phyugs dang de rten// dril chen sgra dag mngon bsgrags pas// gi ni d+ha yi ri la
184a5(mdo): yang grags par 'gyur// phyag ni dril la thor tshugs dbul/ sa pa na nyi zla'i yu mtshon bsnams// zla ba mar ngos bcu gtsu ka gam// / dku'i dus su mchod pa bya// g.yul 'gyed dus su
184a6(mdo): thugs brtse bas// / 'jog rten kun la gzigs pa 'i byor// wA mo le u'i gzugs ston pas// lha me'i mchog ste dpel byed pa'o// phyugs rdzi dgal mo 'i gzugs ston pa // lha dag 'thab pa yang rtag tu/ 
184a7(mdo): rgyal// yun ripe 'jig rten bdel bar gnas// bar 'ga'akhros shi pa bar 'ag zhi// bram ze'i sma ni chos bzhi yi dang // sgyu 'phrul gsapa sngags kun la mkhas// drang sro pa lha'i dab pa brnyes pas// 
184a8(mdo): sa chen 'di dpas khon byed// lha mo 'phya ba'i dus su ya // rgya mtshol lngang bzhin nges par 'du// gnod sbyin klu las stsogs rnams kyis// kun gyi gcol byed 'dul bar byed// mo rnams kun
184b1(mdo): gyi tshangs gyod mchog/ 'jig rten gcol sbyin/ ngag la dpongs// rgyal po'i gnas na/ 'ang pad mo bzhin// chu bo la yang gru dpa gzings// zla ba nya bzhin zha la ya rgyas// mang du thos ldan rten yang byed// 
184b2(mdo): ri bo rtse bzhin spongs pa 'phags// bsam las / gling dang rab kyang ston// lha myin las spogs lha rnams kyis// kun gyis yon tan bkod tso pa bsngags/ yun stong brgya byin rna rgyal ya // gus pa'i sems
184b3(mdo): kyis zhal hU sta// sems can ga pa dag ci 'dod la// de kun bsam pa mU rad+hu skor// blo myur thos pa 'dzind pa yang // sa chen 'di gnas kun gyi mchog/ phyogs bcu'i 'jog rten khams dag tu// rtag tu
184b4(mdo): sgron chen sna byed bzhin// bya dang gcan zan yi dgas kyi// kun gyi bsam pa yongs su skong // bud myed kyi mchog ri po bzhin// / drang srong 'jig rten ring gnas bzhin// lha mo gzhon bzhin 'dod
184b5(mdo): dang pra la// / myi mjed bdag bzhin bden par smra// 'jig rten mthun par gzugs ston cing // 'dod khams par gyi lha gnas su 'am// khyod no lha mo'i/ gtso yon pas// de las mchog pa'i sems
184b6(mdo): can myed// gas te g.yul dang 'jigs pa mi gnas// kyi ma don du lhung bu rang tam// chu bo gas pas kyi rgol las// 'jigs pa de las sgrol khar mdzad// rgyal po 'i chad las btsongs pa'am// yang na dgral 'as/ 
184b7(mdo): gsad par yang // rtse gcig sems ni me g.yos ma// stug A la dag las tha rad/ par 'gyur// dge dang myi dgel kun las/ skyob// byams/ dang brtse bas mdun tu gnas// de phyir/ bdag ni se sems/ btud te// phyag/ 'tshal lha/ 
184b8(mdo): mo chen mo lalo// de nas ya slob dpon yung ston pa bram ze ko l+yad n+yas// lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la// tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gos mngon par bstod do// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad pal nyan par
185a1(mdo): gyis// / lha dang dri za lha dpar bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// bud myed dam pa lha mo mchog gi rab ga pa yin// lha mo dam pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i zhal la bstod// yon tan tu ma sna tshogs bsags pas/ 
185a2(mdo): wa/ yan lag brgyan// dbyangs can zhes bya s+yan ni yangs shing bsod nams 'bar// dri myed ye shes yon tan rnams kyis rnam par brgyan// rin chen sna tshogs tha dad lta bu'i phyir// mchog rab ga pag yon tan khyad pa
185a3(mdo): de bstod do// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub byed pa dang // yang dag bsngags pa yon tan byed pa dang // dri myed mchog dang pad ma 'bar ba dang // myig mchog dang na myog gi dam pa dang // dge' ba'i gnas rang
185a4(mdo): dgel ba mthong ba dang // yon tan bsam myi khyab las brgyan pa dang // zla ba 'dra dang dri ma byed 'od dang // ye shes 'byu ga/ ngas dran pa dam pa dang // seng ge mchog dang myi la zhon pa dang / 
185a5(mdo): lag pa brgyad rnams kyis ni brgyan pa la// mdur zung ral gyi/ dgra sta dang // be con lugs kyi 'khor lo zhags pa bsnams// zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba'i zhal// yid du 'ong ba'i reg dang
185a6(mdo): dbyangs snyan dang // shes rab zab mo dpani ldan pa dang // gos mchog bsgrub byed / sems can dam pa dang // lha dang lha myin dbang pos mchod pa dang // lha dpalta myon tshogs kun gnas brjod dang / 
185a7(mdo): 'byung po'i tshogs kyis gnas rtag mchod pa'i phyir// sA hA// bdag cag lha mo 'di/ phyag bya'o// bdag la yon tan khyad par klur gsol ci // dgos pa kun tu bdag la dngos grub gsol// dgral rnams
185a8(mdo): khrod na bdag la/ rtag tu bsrungs// yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni// nang par langs nas rtsa mar brjod par bya// bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru thams cad rnyed// dngos grub dge ba rgya chen thob
185b1(mdo): par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// bram ze kolpa di n+ye la legs so zhes bka' stsa lad te// khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bdel ba'i phyir/ lha mo dbyangs can la bstod/ 
185b2(mdo): pa dang // dngos grub dam pa slong bas/ bsod nams tshad myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon yu pa ston pa bram ze koSh+ya di n+yas bstod pa dang // kas pa sngags kyi tshig gis// lha mo dbyangs can
185b3(mdo): la gsol nas// ya 'khor de dag la smras pa// skyes bu khyod kyis lha mo dbyangs can s+yan drang ba dang / de'i thugs rjes/ bskyab ci / tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa thogs pa myed pa dang / thos pa 'dzind ci shes
185b4(mdo): rab chen po dang ldan pa dang / gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas shing tshig sbyor ba la rkyen la gsal zhing thogs pa myed pa grub par 'dod pas// bsam kha de nges shing gus pa'i sems kyis// lham/ 
185b5(mdo): dbyangs can s+yan drang ba'i cho ga 'di brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan
185b6(mdo): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas las bstsogs pa// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcu yi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// ya ba dag
185b7(mdo): par bden pa'i gsupa la gnas pa/ mkho yi dbang po dang / mthun par bden pa ston pa myi sku bar gsung ba bskal pa bye ga tshad myed par ya ba dag pa bden pa'ichog rtag tu ston da cing / gsung ba de dag la rjes u/ 
185b8(mdo): yid rang ngo // bden pa gsung bas ljags yangs la ring pa bkram ste// zhal dang / 'jam bu klo pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi la dang / sto gcig dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / 
186a1(mdo): phyogs btsul 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed pa thams cad rgyas par 'gebs gapa/ nyon mongs la'i gdung ba thams cad bsal bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la lus btud de phyag 'chag/ 
186a2(mdo): lo// sngags kyi mtshan nyid dam pa de 'dra ba dang / spobs pa tshad myed pa dpabadag ldan par gyurd cig// // phyag 'tshal bcom ldan dbyangs can mchog// byang chub chen po dbyangs can mchog/ 'phags pa rang
186a3(mdo): rgyal dbyangs can mchog/ zub bzhi ya brgyad dbyangs can mchog/ bden pa bzhi'i gsung dbyangs can mchog// yang dag gzigs dang spro ba dbyangs can mchog// drang srong tshangs la ror dbyangs can mchog// 
186a4(mdo): lha mo u ma dbyangs can mchog/ skyem byed lha ya dbyangs can mchog/ gzi' can klu yang dbyangs can mchog/ man/ na mo lha mo dbyangs can mchog/ rgyal chen bzhi po dbyangs
186a5(mdo): can mchog/ bdel gnas lha sras dbyangs can mchog/ rdo rje gas pa bdag dbyangs can mchog/ khyab 'jug lha yang dbyangs can mchog// lha mo bye ma dbyangs can mchog/ 
186a6(mdo): tshogs bdag lta yab dbyangs can mchog/ dpal gyi lha mo dbyangs can mchog/ dpal gyi blo gros dbyangs can mchog/ hi mi chog 'cha dbyangs can mchog/ ma mo kun mchog dbyangs can mchog/ 
186a7(mdo): 'phrog ma mo yang dbyangs can mchog/ gnod sbyin kun kyang dbyangs can mchog/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal po dbyangs can mchog/ bdag la las mchog kun gyis stongs// mtha' myed / dbyangs can mchog thob
186a8(mdo): mdzod// u myed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par grol la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dod chags bral la phyag 'tshal lo// / bcinges pa bcad la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od snang
186b1(mdo): mang nga la phyag 'ams yon / bden tshig gsupa la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul dang bral la phyag 'tshal lo// don dam gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ma brtso la phyag 'tshal lo// dbyangs can lha la byas
186b2(mdo): 'tshal lo/ bdag nicho ga la thogs myed mchog/ bdag gi zhesam pa ci mchis pa// thams cad myur chu grub par mdzod// nad myed rtag tu bdel pa dang // tshe ring ba yang thob par shog/ rig
186b3(mdo): pa'i gnas la mkhas pa dang // byang chub lam la brtson pa dang // skye bo kun la phan mang mdzod// re ba thams cad myur du skong // bdag gi yang dag bden tshig dang // bdag gis myi slu tshig
186b4(mdo): smras pa/ dbyangs can lha mo tshogs kyis ni// bdag gi don de grug par mdzod// lha mo 'di ni gshegs par gsol// bdag gi tshig la thogs myed mdzod// lus dpangag la myur
186b5(mdo): zhugs shing / yid myur spangs pa rdzogs par mdzod// bad go l+le'i dbang po la// bdel gshegs spobs pa ldan bar mdzod// tshig gi gzil brjid mthul des ni/ 
186b6(mdo): sems can thams cad 'phya bar mdzod// bdag gis tshig ni dza smras pa// don de thams cad grub par shog/ tshig la thams cad gus bskyed cing // byed pa thams cad chud ma gson// nam
186b7(mdo): zhig bdag gi spobs 'dod pa// don de grub par ma gyur da na// lha mo khyod kyi bden tshig pa// thams cad brdzun pa nyid du 'gyur// mtshams myed lnga'i sdig bgyis pa// sangs rgyas bkas ni
186b8(mdo): 'dul bar 'gyur/ gang yang dgra bcom pa dag dang // byams pa bzo'i cho ga rnams dang // sha ri'i bu dang me 'gal dang // bcom ldan 'khor gyi gtso bo ste// de las bstsogs pa yi bde ma tshig kyang / 
187a1(mdo): thams cad bdag la grub par shog/ sangs rgyas nyan thos 'khor rnams dang // bdag gos de pa 'dir phyan 'dren gyis// bdag gi leb bskab pa'i phyir// thams cad myur du gshegs/ 
187a2(mdo): par mdzod// yang dag bden pa'i chog gsol ba// thams cad slu ba myed par shog/ srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dang // gtsang ma'i gnas ni thams cad dang // tshangs pa tshangs chen 'dun / 'don dang // 
187a3(mdo): tshangs pa'i rgya 'khor thams cad dang // stong gsum 'khor ba'i bar dag dang // myi mjed 'jig rten gtso bo dang // de dang de'i 'khor rnams dang // de kun deng 'dir spyan drangs te// thugs rjes bdag
187a4(mdo): la dgongs mdzod cig/ rtse ba kun gyis bzung bar mdzod/ bzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha dag dang // gzhan yang 'bru del dga' lha dag dang // dga' ldan gnam gyi lha dag dang / 
187a5(mdo): rnams dang / byams pa mngon par 'tshang rgya'i gnas/ 'thab 'bral gyi ni lha rnams dang // sum bcu la rtsa gsu ma lha rnams dang // rgyas chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / 
187a6(mdo): bzhan yang lta 'khor thams cad dang // sa chu me rlung lha dag dang // ri rab yun la gnas pa dang // chu bdun pa po lha rnams dang // de kun 'khor dang bcas pa dang // byar yud lnga
187a7(mdo): can nor rgyas dang // nyi zla gza' dang rgyu skar dang // de las stsogs pa'i lha rnams dang // 'jig rten bdel bar mdzad pa'i gnas// de las stsogs pa'i lha thams cad// sdig pa'i las
187a8(mdo): mang mos pa// sangs rgyas 'grus 'byung po'im// bu rab gzhon la byams pa dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams// dri za dang m+b+ha ma yin// bzhan ya myi 'am mi dag dang // lto 'phye
187b1(mdo): ma las gzugs pa zhi rnams// kun kyang bcom ldan mthu thos ni// bdag gos deng 'dir spyan drangs te// thugs rtse pa 'i dgongs pa 'is// bdag la thogs myed spobs pa skyed// lha dang myi rnams thams cad kyi// 
187b2(mdo): gzhan gyi sems rigs mkhyen pa rnams// kun gyi mthula'i sa byin brlabs shi // bdag la spobs pa'i mchog gsol cig/ ji snyed nam mkha'i mthas gtugs shing // chos kyi dbyings kyi mus klags
187b3(mdo): pa'i / sems can de dag thams cad kyis// bdag las stsogs pa'i mchog stsogs shig/ de nas dbyangs can gyi lha mo la// bram ze ko'u di n+yas de skad ces gsol pa dang / lha mos skyes bu chen po de la
187b4(mdo): dge'o zhes smras te/ kar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi khu mo la laHde zhig gis// tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa dang / sngags kyi tshi ga de dag 'chang zhing / 'dzin da pa dang / dkon mchog gsum
187b5(mdo): la skyabs su song song ste/ sems mthun las rjes u dmyigs shir/ tsi 'dod pa'i don chog bzhin du bsgrubs nas/ chud za bar myi 'gyur ro// bzhan yang gser 'od dam kha'i mdo snga
187b6(mdo): pa'o'i rgyal po shi nad tu 'phra zhi pa zab pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa de bsam pa thams cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems g.ye bas byas pa ni ma gtogs so// / de skad
187b7(mdo): ces smras pa dang / bram ze ko'u di n+ya rab tu dgal ba pa dang / yid bdel ba skyes te/ thal mo sbyar ba byas nas rjes su 'dzind to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo
187b8(mdo): dbyangs can la legs so zhes bka' sA lad te/ lha mo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yongs su bsrung bzhipa yongs su rgyas par/ 
188a1(mdo): bya ba dang / mdol 'di 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad la chos 'di sa bu bstand pas bdel ba dang / de bsod nams dang / suza bu tshad byed pa 'phel bar 'gyur te/ gabasems bskyed pa rnams kyang
188a2(mdo): byungs su zu myod pa yar dag par rdzogs pa'i rgya chub pab pa pas na
188b1(mdo): bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'o byang rgyob mngon par rdzogs papa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gzhin rje'i 'jig rten ko sdug bsngal thams cad ga nad tu chad par 'gyur ba
188b2(mdo): 'dis / nam dang ngas dang/ mas dang / san dang / rna ba gams ldan dang / sman pong dang / byed dam/ 'tshan mas kyi bye brag gzhan dag gis kyang / dge gro bcob skung de/ gro yang bgyi'o// de bzhi gas
188b3(mdo): ba dpral bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yo d+ha rgya mtsho bai dUr+ya dang // ser gau ro khe dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i sra pa bskyed de/ 
188b4(mdo): des da ltar/ phyog sa gang dang / gang du sems pa dang / phyogs gang dang gang du lta ba dang / phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang der so/ sa can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bdel bar sbyar ba thos cad
188b5(mdo): khyim ma la bang 'gyur// zas dpa ma ma dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mtshan bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rtse bu dru nga dub dang / man shes dang / byi ru dang / dbub dang / se me skam dang / yo
188b6(mdo): byad gnon dag gas nga rgya 'i mangs par 'gyur // sems can de da/ thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// ma chen mo dpal gis nus/ ro bzhin gshegs pa des mchad pa bya thob dang / metog dang / gdug pa
188b7(mdo): mchen thod pal kyi myo nganas lan gsum brjod / de sa sa dang / gdug pa dang / me to// kyang byon pa/ natsag pad/ na/ rgyun phung badzin pa rnam pa rgya/ de / 
188b8(mdo): pa'i thun dag rnam par // gnasas cag tub tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'bras bul tog su ma 'ang ldan larnam man zhon tu mtshogs rnams kyang babyed// gzer mod dam pa cad ma
189a1(mdo): rgyal po'i myong brjod sems can de dag la// lha mo chen mo dpal ni sems par 'gyur// de dag dpal chen byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// dpal lha mo chen mo la legs so zhes bka' stsal da te/ legs
189a2(mdo): so logs so// lha mo khyod kyis stan byas pa rjes su dran pas// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang // sems can tshad myed pa rnams la// phan pa dang / bde bas phan 'dogs sho po/ mdo' sde yang yongs su rgyas par byed par// bdod
